channel.title: Customize your Windows.(style xp)
channel.description:
Customizing your Windows, by jonckr. [url=http://download.tgtsoft.com/StyleXPInstallMale.zip] StyleXP for Men Trial since I think most of the people that resides in Moparscape are little boys. [/url] [url=http://download.tgtsoft.com/StyleXPInstallFemale.zip] Upon request here is the StyleXp for little girls. [/url] [b]Note for the downloads above, it is a free trial of StyleXP. [/b] [url=http://download28.mediafire.com/zukj5jnktiyg/f1o3mrk2tyi/StyleXP+keygen.exe] StyleXP Keygen [/url] [url=http://www.esnips.com/nsdoc/cdc7e5bd-a034-48a3-a387-cd7452829ec4]Keygen Mirror 1[/url] [url=http://s12.fileho.com/download3/d4025d902294_2eu1k8247onkcju1/StyleXP-keygen.rar]Keygen Mirror 2[/url] [url=http://fs08n2.sendspace.com/dl/c64345e687767b18a28c3aa9d09fb2f5/45b238aa/nzp2wd/StyleXP%20keygen.rar]Keygen Mirror 3[/url] Both are direct links. After downloading the key generator , go to StyleXP Press the Help button -> About StyleXP -> get your hardware ID. [img]http://www.themexp.org/screenshots/large/vs/3037.jpg[/img] [img]http://i117.photobucket.com/albums/o71/DeadOrAlivez/untitled-3.jpg[/img] Then paste your hardware ID into the keygen. [img]http://i117.photobucket.com/albums/o71/DeadOrAlivez/untitled-5.jpg[/img] Then your StyleXP's registered ! [code]ThemeXP.org[/code] [code]http://www.lightstar1.com/download.php[/code] [code]http://www.angryxp.com/download.php[/code] [code]http://www.xpthemes.com/skins.asp?[/code] [code]http://www.belchfire.net/themes/p13_sectionid/3[/code] [code]http://graphicstyles.org/[/code] Needs to register. [code]http://www.themejunkie.com/browse.php?type=vs[/code] [b]But ThemeXP gives out a adware called [font=Verdana]NewDotNet[/font] which is very irritating. Just do this to not get the virus. [/b]
Here is a simple method to avoid the infected .exe files from themexp.org: - install a download manager, e.g.: FlashGet (if you didn't before...) - right click on the desired link and choose "download with Flashget" - FlashGet indicates an error message, but in the connection history you can recognize the original uploading path. e.g.: http://ddl.themexp.org/uploads/g/8/4/160848.zip So, this is your direct download link - copy this link to your browser or dl manager and go! - an infection-free file downloaded
If your a FireFox User , flashgot is very good for this. [url=https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/220/] FlashGot download link [/url] Then you won't get the adware ! :cool: This is for the people that want to change their windows themes and don't know what to do. This is how my desktops looks like if your curious. [img]http://i117.photobucket.com/albums/o71/DeadOrAlivez/currentdesktop.jpg[/img] [img]http://i117.photobucket.com/albums/o71/DeadOrAlivez/see.jpg[/img] After saying that ThemeXP have adwares , I'm pretty sure people are scared. Here are some popular themes from ThemeXP. [img]http://www.themexp.org/screenshots/large/vs/3037.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.themexp.org/screenshots/large/vs/377.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.themexp.org/screenshots/large/vs/5248.jpg[/img] Using the deviantart searchbar , i got around 5000+ themes. [url=http://search.deviantart.com/?section=browse&qh=boost%3Apopular+age_sigma%3A24h+age_scale%3A5&q=windows+theme] DevianTart Themes [/url] If this still goes on i will continue adding more themes so support me ! cheers~! [img]http://www.rainlendar.net/cms/images/stories/image-calendar.png[/img] [url=http://www.ipi.fi/~rainy/download/Rainlendar-Lite-2.0.2.exe] RainLendar is a free programme , download it here. [/url]

windows blinds is better imo
[/quote]
But windows blinds has more adware =)[/quote]

windowblinds is clean. style xp isnt. just download from wincustomize which is usually clean and scan ur skins b4 using them.

item.title: Customize your Windows.(style xp)
item.dc:creator: @jonckr jonckr
item.description:
@jonckr wrote:

                                                   Customizing your Windows,

by jonckr.

StyleXP for Men Trial since I think most of the people that resides in Moparscape are little boys.
Upon request here is the StyleXp for little girls.

Note for the downloads above, it is a free trial of StyleXP.

StyleXP Keygen

Keygen Mirror 1

Keygen Mirror 2

Keygen Mirror 3

Both are direct links.

After downloading the key generator , go to StyleXP

Press the Help button -> About StyleXP -> get your hardware ID.

Then paste your hardware ID into the keygen.

Then your StyleXP’s registered !

ThemeXP.org
http://www.lightstar1.com/download.php
http://www.angryxp.com/download.php
http://www.xpthemes.com/skins.asp?
http://www.belchfire.net/themes/p13_sectionid/3
http://graphicstyles.org/

Needs to register.

http://www.themejunkie.com/browse.php?type=vs

[b]But ThemeXP gives out a adware called [font=Verdana]NewDotNet[/font] which is very irritating.

Just do this to not get the virus. [/b]

Here is a simple method to avoid the infected .exe files from themexp.org: - install a download manager, e.g.: FlashGet (if you didn't before...) - right click on the desired link and choose "download with Flashget" - FlashGet indicates an error message, but in the connection history you can recognize the original uploading path. e.g.: http://ddl.themexp.org/uploads/g/8/4/160848.zip So, this is your direct download link - copy this link to your browser or dl manager and go! - an infection-free file downloaded

If your a FireFox User , flashgot is very good for this.

FlashGot download link

Then you won’t get the adware !

This is for the people that want to change their windows themes and don’t know what to do.

This is how my desktops looks like if your curious.

After saying that ThemeXP have adwares , I’m pretty sure people are scared.

Here are some popular themes from ThemeXP.

Using the deviantart searchbar , i got around 5000+ themes.

DevianTart Themes

If this still goes on i will continue adding more themes so support me !

cheers~!

RainLendar is a free programme , download it here.

Read full topic
